goal: UPTR is an Belgian professional tranport federation representing Belgian road hauliers en logistic compagnies on a regional, national en EU level. UPTR offers its membres a wide range of administrative services, legal services and information updates in order to lighten the burden of administration that today's transport compagnies are required to deal with. UPTR has got a lobby and representation mission to ameliorate the Belgian road hauliers economic position on the Belgian en Eupean market.
interests: Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Transport
